articles.title: Historic new year for Croatia as it joins euro, Schengen area - Reuters.com
articles.description: Croatia rang in two historic changes with the new year, as the European Union's youngest member joined both the EU's border-free Schengen zone and the euro common currency, fulfilling longstanding ambitions of close integration with Europe.
articles.content: BREGANA BORDER CROSSING, Croatia, Jan 1 (Reuters) - Croatia rang in two historic changes with the new year, as the European Union's youngest member joined both the EU's border-free Schengen zone and … [+1887 chars]

articles.title: World steps into 2023 after turbulent year - News24
articles.description: The world's eight billion people Saturday ushered in 2023, bidding farewell to a turbulent 12 months marked by war in Europe, stinging price rises, Lionel Messi's World Cup glory and the deaths of Queen Elizabeth, Pele and former pope Benedict.
articles.content:
• The world ushered in the New Year in the first 'normal' celebrations since the onset of the Covid-19 pandemic.
